etymologies: sen (sense 1 of the noun) represents cent; sen (sense 2 of the noun) is of Japanese origin

definitions: a monetary unit of Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Malaysia, equal to one hundredth of a dollar in Brunei, one hundredth of a riel in Cambodia, one hundredth of a rupiah in Indonesia, and one hundredth of a ringgit in Malaysia.
shortDefinitions: monetary unit of Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Malaysia, equal to one hundredth of dollar in Brunei, one hundredth of riel in Cambodia, one hundredth of rupiah in Indonesia

definitions: a former monetary unit in Japan, equal to one hundredth of a yen.
shortDefinitions: former monetary unit in Japan, equal to one hundredth of yen
